alert.note: Alert for Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 09 at 12:03AM CDT until July 09 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR WESTERN TEXAS AND SOUTHEASTERN CIMARRON COUNTIES... At 1202 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Texhoma, or 18 miles west of Guymon, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Guymon, Goodwell, Texhoma, Optima, Eva, Hough and Griggs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
